flavor: Small, vicious crews of silt pirates lurk along the lonelier coasts, preying on silt skimmers loaded with trade goods. Did you join a pirate crew as a youth, captured by the romance of the notion? Did you win the piratesâ€™ respect by standing up to them? What led you to abandon your crew and strike out on your own?
name: Sea Of Silt - Silt Pirate
